General.Name: China New Higher Education Group Limited
General.Description: China New Higher Education Group Limited, an investment holding company, provides private education services in the People's Republic of China. The company operates education institutions under Yunnan Technology and Business University, Guizhou Vocational College of Industry and Commerce, Science and Technology College of Hubei Minzu University, Harbin Huade University, Lanzhou University of Technology College of Technology and Engineering, Luoyang Vocation College of Science and Technology, and Talent International College Guangxi names. It also offers human resource, property, technical, and management consultancy services; and sells textbooks. China New Higher Education Group Limited was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: Tower F, Phoenix Place, Beijing, China
